At American Farm Co, our Faith in the Lord, our relationships with family and friends and our love for farming have enriched our lives and shaped our vision.

For generations, our families and communities have taken pride in providing for thousands of other Americans through our life’s work as farmers. We’ve all been a part of the highs and lows that are part of family farming, but have always enjoyed being able to lend a helping hand, a tractor, or advice to one another for decades.

It's that love for farming that runs in our veins and the daily grace given to us by our God that drives us at American Farm Co. We are honored to wake up each day, serve our families, tend to our crops and care for our livestock, and ultimately trust that the seeds we plant will grow and produce a bountiful harvest. 

American Farm Co represents all of the hardworking men and women that have dedicated their lives to not only feeding America, but feeding the world. 

To be an American Farmer is to truly live the American Dream.
